thread.section_title: Point A Hotel, London Paddington - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Rooms vary in size, noisy, but super clean
thread.title_full: Rooms vary in size, noisy, but super clean - Review of Point A Hotel, London Paddington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Katie D
title: Rooms vary in size, noisy, but super clean
text:
Really decent hotel and convenient location. The only thing that let's it down is the noise. Walls and windows are thin, so can be a problem if you're in a front room.
Rooms do vary in size, so ask for a bigger one - they are all the same price.
Trip is always made easy by the front of house member called Mate. He makes the experience feel premium and no ask is too big.
Will continue to book but specify a room.
